body: Yes, one copy would be great! I think it shouldn't be very hard with a `bitset` to check if a given dim is in `dims` and openmp like [this](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/aten/src/ATen/native/Embedding.cpp#L110-L150).
body_html: Yes, one copy would be great! I think it shouldn't be very hard with a bitset to check if a given dim is in dims and openmp like this.
body_text: Yes, one copy would be great! I think it shouldn't be very hard with a bitset to check if a given dim is in dims and openmp like this.
